about_the_game:
Storyline

In the game, you have to try your hand at defending humanity from the invasion of zombies! Who will do it better than the Great Wall Builder, Mr. Trump? xD However, zombies are not as simple as they seem. With every attempt, they become stronger, deft and faster. In order to defeat them, you need to develop an individual strategy for each of the types of zombies. To do this, you will be helped by a number of features, such as combining types of shells and weapons.

Genre [/]
Do you remember custom maps of WC3 so loved by many players? They served as inspiration for creating a game designed in the style of Lane Wars with the implementation of the RPG system.

===============

Main Features

===============
► RPG System (Character and different zombie types):
  • ⟶ Strength (+hp);
  • ⟶ Agility (+dmg, +speed);
  • ⟶ Luck (+3xmax dmg);
► Different weapon types:
  • ⟶ Pistol;
  • ⟶ Shotgun (launches x2 bullets);
  • ⟶ Machinegun;
  • ⟶ Rifle (+2 piercing targets);
► Different ammo types:
  • ⟶ Simple;
  • ⟶ Piercing (+1 pirecing target);
  • ⟶ Freezing (x2 slower movement speed);
  • ⟶ Bleeding (dmg every second);
  • ⟶ Exloding (explodes in 2m radius);
► Building barricades:
  • ⟶ ▍, ▃, ∎, ⬢ ;
==========================================
detailed_description:
Storyline

In the game, you have to try your hand at defending humanity from the invasion of zombies! Who will do it better than the Great Wall Builder, Mr. Trump? xD However, zombies are not as simple as they seem. With every attempt, they become stronger, deft and faster. In order to defeat them, you need to develop an individual strategy for each of the types of zombies. To do this, you will be helped by a number of features, such as combining types of shells and weapons.

Genre [/]
Do you remember custom maps of WC3 so loved by many players? They served as inspiration for creating a game designed in the style of Lane Wars with the implementation of the RPG system.

===============

Main Features

===============
► RPG System (Character and different zombie types):
  • ⟶ Strength (+hp);
  • ⟶ Agility (+dmg, +speed);
  • ⟶ Luck (+3xmax dmg);

  • ⟶ Pistol;

  • ⟶ Machinegun;
  • ⟶ Rifle (+2 piercing targets);
► Different ammo types:

  • ⟶ Piercing (+1 pirecing target);

  • ⟶ Bleeding (dmg every second);
  • ⟶ Exloding (explodes in 2m radius);
► Building barricades:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+.
  • Processor: DX9 (shader 3.0) or DX11 with support level 9.3 (>512 mb)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader 3.0) or DX11 with support level 9.3 (>512 mb)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+.
  • Processor: Core i3 (support SSE2)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader 3.0) or DX11 with support level 9.3 (>1gb)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: DX9 (shader 3.0) or DX11 with support level 9.3 (>512 mb)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: shader 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Core i3 (support SSE2)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader 3.0) or DX11 with support level 9.3 (>1gb)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Zombie Lane Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Core 2 duo (support SSE2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader 3.0) or DX11 with support level 9.3 (>512 mb)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Core i3 (support SSE2)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader 3.0) or DX11 with support level 9.3 (>1gb)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Zombie threat overtaken America. Destroy as many zombies as you can. Play for Trump and make America great again! To do this you need to develop your own tactics combining weapons, ammo types, character abilities and barricades location.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
